fields.request: Manual QA: Verify Send Local RFIDs to CP action
fields.request_details:
1. Navigate to Admin → OCPP → Chargers and select a charge point with an active connection.
2. Trigger the 'Send Local RFIDs to CP' admin action.
3. Confirm the SendLocalList payload includes every RFID marked as Released (including those not currently allowed) with each idTagInfo.status set to Accepted.
4. Check the charger or charger log to confirm it acknowledges the updated list version without errors.
